Fisherwomen by Craig Easton

Special boxed Artist Edition (only 50 available)

The 24 page portfolio comes (as the name suggests) in a bespoke embossed box along with with an original 12" × 16" print of The hands that gut the herring (see attached) and a signed & numbered certificate of authenticity.
